title: Admin login success
description: Verify that administrator can log in with correct credentials and access protected admin routes.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin login page.
Input valid administrator username and password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is successful and dashboard is displayed.
Navigate to a protected admin page directly via URL.
Ensure access is granted without redirect to login page.

title: Admin login failure with incorrect credentials
description: Ensure login fails when administrator enters invalid username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin login page.
Input invalid username or password.
Click the login button.
Verify an error message is displayed and login is denied.
Attempt to access protected admin routes after failed login.
Verify redirection back to login page.

title: Admin logout functionality
description: Verify that administrator can log out successfully and session is terminated.

steps.description: Log in as an administrator with valid credentials.
Click the logout button on the admin panel.
Verify that session is terminated and user is redirected to login page.
Attempt to access any admin page after logout.
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login.

title: CRUD operations on products
description: Verify that administrator can create, read, update and delete products successfully with database persistence.

steps.description: Log in as administrator and navigate to product management page.
Create a new product with all required fields including category, sizes, prices and optional image upload.
Verify the new product appears in product list with correct data.
Update the product details such as price, name or image.
Verify the updated product data is saved and reflected in the list.
Delete the created product.
Verify the product is removed from the database and product list.

title: CRUD operations on categories
description: Ensure administrator can create, read, update and delete product categories with persistence.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to category management.
Add a new product category.
Confirm the category appears in the list.
Modify the category name.
Verify updated name is shown.
Delete the category.
Ensure the category no longer appears and products are either reassigned or handle category deletion gracefully.

title: Filter product catalog by category and promotion
description: Verify clients can filter the product catalog by category and active promotions on homepage.

steps.description: Open the web homepage.
Use filter controls to select a specific category.
Verify only products belonging to the selected category are displayed.
Toggle filter for promotional products.
Confirm only products with promotions are shown.
Combine filters (category + promotion).
Ensure product list displays correct filtered results.

title: Add customized product to shopping cart
description: Ensure client can select product size, flavors, stuffed crust option, and add to cart with correct pricing.

steps.description: Navigate to a product details page.
Select a size for the product.
Choose one or multiple flavors.
Select stuffed crust option if available.
Add the customized product to the shopping cart.
Verify the item is added with correct details and pricing, including promotions and additional costs.

title: Persistent shopping cart across sessions
description: Verify the shopping cart retains items, quantities and pricing after user closes and reopens browser.

steps.description: Add multiple items with different customizations to the cart.
Close the browser or tab.
Reopen the web application and access the cart.
Confirm that previously added items are still present with correct quantities and prices.

title: Modify shopping cart quantities and check price recalculation
description: Ensure client can update quantity of items in cart and pricing updates accordingly including promotions and extras.

steps.description: Open the shopping cart containing multiple items.
Change the quantity of an item to a valid number.
Verify total price and individual item price update correctly.
Set quantity to zero or remove an item.
Verify item is removed from cart and pricing updates.

title: Checkout process with delivery selection and WhatsApp integration
description: Verify client can proceed through checkout steps with personal data input, select delivery, choose payment, and finish order with WhatsApp message sent.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout with items in the cart.
Fill in customer personal information including name, address, and phone.
Select delivery option.
Choose a payment method from available options.
Confirm and finalize the order.
Verify that order data is validated and a WhatsApp message with order details is composed/sent.

title: Checkout process with pickup selection and payment options
description: Confirm client can complete checkout choosing pickup (retirada) with valid payment and finishing order correctly.

steps.description: Go to checkout with items in cart.
Enter required customer information.
Select pickup as order modality.
Select payment method.
Submit the order.
Ensure order validation passes and WhatsApp message is prepared and dispatched.

title: Checkout error handling for missing or invalid customer data
description: Verify checkout prevents submission and shows errors when required customer fields are missing or invalid.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout.
Leave required personal data fields empty or enter invalid data (e.g., invalid phone number).
Attempt to finalize order.
Verify error messages appear for each invalid or missing field and order cannot be submitted.

title: Update store configurations reflections
description: Verify that changes made by admins in store configurations like delivery fees, payment options, and opening hours are reflected throughout the application.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to configurations page.
Change delivery fees, add/remove payment options and adjust opening hours.
Save configuration changes.
Log out and as client, refresh store front pages including checkout.
Verify updated fees, payment options, and hours are reflected correctly.

title: Product image upload and preview in admin panel
description: Ensure admin can upload product images and preview them before saving changes in product management.

steps.description: Log in and go to product editing page.
Upload a valid image file for the product.
Verify uploaded image preview is displayed correctly.
Save product changes.
Confirm the image is persisted and visible on the product catalog.

title: Homepage carousel display and navigation
description: Check the carousel on the homepage displays promotional images correctly and allows navigation controls (next/prev).

steps.description: Open homepage.
Confirm carousel images are visible and auto-rotate correctly.
Use navigation arrows or dots to go to next and previous images.
Verify the images update accordingly.

title: Footer social and contact information display
description: Verify that the footer displays configured social media links and contact information consistently.

steps.description: Navigate to any page of the application.
Confirm footer shows active social media icons with working links and contact details as configured.

title: Access control for debug tools
description: Ensure debug tools under admin panel are accessible only by authenticated administrators.

steps.description: Attempt to access debug tools page without logging in.
Verify access is denied and redirected to login page.
Login as admin and access debug tools page.
Confirm debug tools are available and functional.

title: Database security with Row Level Security (RLS)
description: Validate that Row Level Security policies prevent unauthorized data access in PostgreSQL.

steps.description: Attempt to query product and order data from a client context bypassing authentication.
Verify that data access is restricted as per RLS policies.
Query data using authenticated admin context.
Confirm full access to relevant data is granted.

title: Application responsiveness and WCAG compliance
description: Verify that the application is fully responsive on different screen sizes and supports WCAG accessibility standards.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet and multiple mobile devices.
Confirm UI elements adapt appropriately without loss of functionality or content.
Use a screen reader and keyboard only navigation.
Verify that all interactive components are accessible and usable.

title: Performance check under load conditions
description: Assess that application pages load within 3 seconds under expected normal user load.

steps.description: Simulate multiple users browsing homepage, product catalog, and checkout simultaneously.
Measure page load times and verify they are below 3 seconds.
